even if you managed to copy the video files from that 30mb download to the correct folder, the intro movie would still be missing. 

this is because a file called game_introduction.bik, which contains the intro movie, has been left out from this torrent and the extra download.

but on the plus side, you can still see your character in the creation if you skip the intro movie as soon as it starts to play. 

apart from the missing intro, this ripped version of the game works and plays fine. so i guess we should be happy with that.
